workouts.name: Swimming
workouts.description_short: Lap swimming earns points per mile.

workouts.name: Cycling
workouts.description_short: Cycling on a machine or your own bike earns points per mile.

workouts.name: Running
workouts.description_short: Running outside or on a treadmill earns points per mile.

workouts.name: High Intesity Cardio
workouts.description_short: Includes things like interval training, tabatas, Insanity, etc.

workouts.name: Low Intesity Cardio
workouts.description_short: Includes things like climbing, swimming, cycling, etc.

workouts.name: Weight Training
workouts.description_short: Includes non-bodyweight lifting like barbell squats, deadlifts, bench press, etc.

workouts.name: Lunges
workouts.description_short: Earn 25 points per lunge (one lunge means lunging with both legs).

workouts.name: Push Ups
workouts.description_short: Earn 25 points per push up. Record push ups at 1/3 rate for kipping.

workouts.name: Pull Ups
workouts.description_short: Earn 50 points per pull up. Record pull ups at 1/3 rate for kipping.
